Sockets

 1import os
 2from app import socketio
 3from utils.logging import logger
 4import json
 5import random
 6import uuid
 7from app.audiostream import AudioStream
 8from tinydb import TinyDB, Query
 9
10from flask import (
11    Blueprint, flash, g, redirect, render_template, request, session, url_for, jsonify, make_response
12)
13
14base_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
15db_dir = os.path.join(base_dir, "../db")
16nfctag_db = os.path.join(db_dir, "nfctags.json")
17db = TinyDB(nfctag_db)
18
19audiopath = os.path.join(base_dir, "../audio")
20
21
22def find_audio_file_path(poiID):
23    """
24    Funksjon som finner riktig lydfil basert på tilsent interessepunkt.
25
26    """
27    if not isinstance(poiID, int):
28        logger.info("cant find file because it search term not int")
29        return
30
31    res = db.search(Query().poiID == poiID)
32
33    logger.info("from find_audio_filename: got {}".format(res[0]["audio_filename"]))
34    if res:
35        audio_file_path = os.path.join(audiopath, res[0]["audio_filename"])
36        return audio_file_path
37    else:
38        logger.info(f"error from find_audio_file got res: {res} ")
39        return None
40
41@socketio.on('connect')
42def handle_connect():
43    logger.info("Client connected")
44    socketio.emit('server_message', {'data': 'Welcome!'})
45
46@socketio.on('ready_for_message')
47def check_cookie():
48    cookie = request.cookies.get("user_data")
49    
50    if not cookie:
51        logger.info(f"No cookie found")
52        socketio.emit('no_cookie', {'message': 'no cookie exists'})
53        return
54    
55    user_data = json.loads(cookie)
56    
57    try:
58        logger.info("sending from landing page socket")
59        socketio.emit("colorchange", {"color": user_data['color']})
60    except Exception as e:
61        logger.error(f"failed to emit socket {e}")
62
63
64@socketio.on('request_audio')
65def handle_audio_request(data):
66    logger.info("initializing audio request")
67
68    poiId = int(data.get('poiId'))
69
70    audio_file_path = find_audio_file_path(poiId)
71
72    #if not isinstance(audio_file_path, str):
73    #    logger.info("not a string received")
74    #    return socketio.emit('error', {'message': 'did not receive string'})
75
76    if not audio_file_path.strip():
77        logger.info("empty audio_file_path!")
78        return socketio.emit('error', {'message': 'no audio_file_path given'})
79
80    audiostream = AudioStream(audio_file_path)
81    
82    logger.info(f"Started audio stream with filepath: {audio_file_path}")
83
84    try:
85        audiofile = audiostream.simple_send()
86        socketio.emit('audio_file', audiofile)
87    except Exception as e:
88        logger.error(f"audio stream fail, error message: {e}")
89        return socketio.emit('error', {'message:': 'failed to send audio'})
90
91    logger.info("audio stream ended")
92
93@socketio.on('disconnect')
94def handle_disconnect():
95    logger.info("client disconnected")
